message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable item at a reasonable price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $110 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $90?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $110 might be a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle at $97?  That's a fair price.

I understand that $105 was a bit too high for you, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $97. I'm willing to compromise again and offer it to you for $102. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of this product.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable here.  $99 is my final offer.  If you can't do that, I'll have to go with a different seller.

I understand that you're trying to be reasonable, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $99. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $101. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
